channel.title: Rune-Fire V1 *508* [ RELEASE ]
channel.description:
[COLOR="Blue"]Rune-Fire 508 v.1![/COLOR] [SIZE="5"]Base: BlueCore. Info: Trading, may be Finished in v.2, Along with Barrows.[/SIZE]
[SIZE="7"] If you're Going to, Download this, Please post a FeedBack.[/SIZE]
[SIZE="7"]Updates![/SIZE] ----------------------------------- - Warriors Guild. Not Finished. - Trading. Not Finished. - G.E Collect Packets and Interface Added. - Thieving added. (Basic) - Mining. (Basic) - Castlewars. (Not Finished) - Updated the Quest Menu. Now gives Items :p Instead of the 'RS Quests'. - Added Bone Burying Base. - Christmas Items! Items: Reindeer Hat. ('Operate' For the Emote). Snowball (Wielding), Gives Range Exp. - Basic QC (Quick Chat). - Friends List, Almost Working. (Doesnt have the 'Loading Please Wait') - Added a starter. (You can edit it). - Fishing. (Object). - BH (High Crater Now Works!) I, added a InterFace, So you will have to Edit that. :p - Added a Log In Interface, Hope you like it :p ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [COLOR="Red"]Commands[/COLOR] ~ ::Fish ~ ::Mining ~ ::CastleWars ~ ::Guild ~ ::Empty ~ ::Thieving ---------------------------------------------- [COLOR="Lime"]Pics![/COLOR] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/348ox00.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/4lnbs0.jpg[/img] ------------------------------------------------- Video:
[URL=http://"http://nl.tinypic.com/player.php?v=1z72eio&s=5"]View My Video[/URL]
2nd Video:
[URL=http://"http://nl.tinypic.com/player.php?v=ev49ph&s=5"]View My Video[/URL]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [MediaFire] Download 1: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/file/mzayqydyzyt/Rune-Fire v.1 508 Release.zip]http://www.mediafire.com/file/mzayqydyzyt/Rune-Fire v.1 508 Release.zip[/url]
[Files.FileFront] Download 2: [url=http://files.filefront.com/Rune+Fire+v1+508+Releasezip/;13103614;/fileinfo.html]http://files.filefront.com/Rune+Fire+v1+508+Releasezip/;13103614;/fileinfo.html[/url]
[Uppit] Download 3: [url=http://uppit.com/U6JXPH]http://uppit.com/U6JXPH[/url] ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [SIZE="7"]Credits![/SIZE] Everyone's Tutorials that I have used. BlueCore for the Base. Me For Editing It. And All of my Reply'ers :p ------------------------------------- Hope you Like it!
Rate: 0/10 TERRIBLE! Dont Make a v.2!! 1/10 Very Bad. 2/10 Bad. 3/10 Dont Even bother Coding.. 4/10 Descent. 5/10 Ok. 6/10 I liked it! 7/10 Nice! 8/10 Great! 9/10 Amazing! 10/10 Great Job, Make a v.2!
More Pics! [COLOR="Red"]Jad[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2daak3d.jpg[/img]
[COLOR="Red"]CastleWars (Not Working Yet)[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/33f3wac.jpg[/img]
Bounty Hunter! [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/r2496w.jpg[/img]
Home [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2v2tm39.jpg[/img]
~Skills~ - Mining [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/vx2at4.jpg[/img]
-Fishing. ([COLOR="Red"]No Pic[/COLOR]) -Agility. ([COLOR="Red"]No Pic[/COLOR])
Thieving [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/i5rspg.jpg[/img]
Training [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/1z1p4.jpg[/img]
The Ownage Quest Menu! [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2dkguo4.jpg[/img]
Auto-Retailition [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/3484tc3.jpg[/img]
Warrior's Guild. (No Pic at this Time).
------------------------------------------------------------------ [SIZE="7"]More Pics Soon!!![/SIZE][br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 01, 2009, 09:54:14 am[/size][hr]*Please Comment*
I may be making a V2, Depending on the poll. Hope you enjoy!

item.title: Rune-Fire V1 *508* [ RELEASE ]
item.dc:creator: @RPX RPX
item.description:
@RPX wrote:

[COLOR=“Blue”]Rune-Fire 508 v.1![/COLOR]
[SIZE=“5”]Base: BlueCore.
Info: Trading, may be Finished in v.2, Along with Barrows.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=“7”] If you’re Going to, Download this, Please post a FeedBack.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=“7”]Updates![/SIZE]

  • Warriors Guild. Not Finished.
  • Trading. Not Finished.
  • G.E Collect Packets and Interface Added.
  • Thieving added. (Basic)
  • Mining. (Basic)
  • Castlewars. (Not Finished)
  • Updated the Quest Menu. Now gives Items Instead of the ‘RS Quests’.
  • Added Bone Burying Base.
  • Christmas Items! Items: Reindeer Hat. (‘Operate’ For the Emote). Snowball (Wielding), Gives Range Exp.
  • Basic QC (Quick Chat).
  • Friends List, Almost Working. (Doesnt have the ‘Loading Please Wait’)
  • Added a starter. (You can edit it).
  • Fishing. (Object).
  • BH (High Crater Now Works!) I, added a InterFace, So you will have to Edit that.
  • Added a Log In Interface, Hope you like it

[COLOR=“Red”]Commands[/COLOR]
~ ::Fish
~ ::Mining
~ ::CastleWars
~ ::Guild
~ ::Empty
~ ::Thieving

[COLOR=“Lime”]Pics![/COLOR]
348ox00.jpg773×543

4lnbs0.jpg741×532

Video:

[SIZE=“7”]Credits![/SIZE]
Everyone’s Tutorials that I have used.
BlueCore for the Base.
Me For Editing It.
And All of my Reply’ers

Hope you Like it!

5/10 Ok.
6/10 I liked it!

9/10 Amazing!
10/10 Great Job, Make a v.2!
